RapidFit:
//================================================ // Formal Parameters to be fitted or fixed
//........................................ // Parameters which can be fixed for Scans
//Fractions
SignalFractionUBU 0.68 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBT 0.62 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
// Mass
alphaM_pr 0.0017 Free Unitless
f_sig_m1 0.803 0.0 1.00001 Fixed Unitless
sigma_m1 6.45 0.0 100.0 Free MeV/c^{2}
ratio_21 2.258 1.0 10.0 Fixed MeV/c^{2}
m_Bs 5368.0 Free MeV/c^{2}
// LL lifetimes
f_LL1 0.99285 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
tau_LL1 0.15 0.01 0.5 Free Unitless
tau_LL2 1.0 0.05 3.0 Free Unitless
//.......................................... // Parameters which cant be fixed for scans
// True Physics Parameters for signal
gamma 0.67 0.0 2.0 Free ps^{-1}
deltaGamma 0.13 -0.1 0.3 Free ps^{-1}
Aperp_sq 0.25 0. 0.5 Free Unitless
Azero_sq 0.50 Free 0. 0.8 Unitless
As_sq 0.02 0. 0.25 Free Unitless
delta_para 3.3 6.3 -6.3 Free Unitless
delta_perp 2.9 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
delta_zero 0.0 -3.3 3.3 Fixed Unitless
delta_s 2.9 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
deltaM 17.63 Free ps-1
Phi_s 0.19 Free Unitless
//.................................. // Detector Parameters
//Signal PDF time resolution parameters for double gaussian model.
timeResolutionScale 1.45 Free unitless
timeResolution1 0.0434 Fixed ps
timeResolution2 0.0853 Fixed ps
timeResolution3 0.513 Fixed ps
timeResolution2Fraction 0.165 Fixed unitless
timeResolution3Fraction 0.0017 Fixed unitless
timeOffset //Leave at Zero, this is not used anywhere yet. 0.000 Fixed ps
// Angular acceptance factors
angAccI1 #1.0 0.9792 Fixed Unitless
angAccI2 #1.0 1.0296 Fixed Unitless
angAccI3 #1.0 1.0319 Fixed Unitless
angAccI4 #0.0 -0.0035 Fixed Unitless
angAccI5 #0.0 0.0001 Fixed Unitless
angAccI6 #0.0 -0.0010 Fixed Unitless
angAccI7 #1.0 0.9927 Fixed Unitless
angAccI8 #0.0 0.0003 Fixed Unitless
angAccI9 #0.0 -0.0003 Fixed Unitless
angAccI10 #0.0 -0.0078 Fixed Unitless
// Mistag parameters
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1 1.035 Free
mistagP0 0.392 Free
mistagSetPoint 0.391 Fixed
//............................................ // Background model
//Long lived time resolution components
timeResLL1Frac 1.0 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL1 0.00 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL2 0.00 Fixed Unitless
//========================================== // Specify which minimiser to use.
Minuit 100000 0.0001 1
NegativeLogLikelihoodThreaded 128 #Petes False
1
//========================================== // Specify the fit
//................................... // This applies a constraint on deltaM
deltaM 17.63 0.11
timeResolutionScale 1.45 0.06
// This applies a constraint on mistag scale
mistagP1 1.035 0.024
mistagP0 0.392 0.009
// .................... // Attempt to constrain LLscan on the amplitudes
ATOTAL 1.0 0.00001
// .................... // Attempt to constrain GH and GL positive
GLandGH 0.0 0.00001
//======================================== // UN-BIASED UN-TAGGED events
SignalFractionUBU
Bs2JpsiPhi_SignalAlt_MO_v4 UseTimeAcceptance:True TimeAcceptanceFile:2011-1fb-timeAcceptance-v5-Bs-40b.txt tag:tagdecision_os mistag:tagomega_os cosTheta:trcostheta cosPsi:trcospsi phi:trphi UseEventResolution:True eventResolution:sigmat
